Introduction

Moon Tae Il is a former member of the South Korean boy group NCT under SM Entertainment. He served as the main vocalist of the group's sub-units NCT U and NCT 127.

Taeil was born on June 14th 1994. Aside from singing, Taeil is also admired for his dancing and ability to play the guitar.

Taeil made his debut in April 2016 in the rotational unit NCT U and became a member of the Seoul-based unit NCT 127 in July 2016.

On August 28th SM ENT. announced he will be leaving the group due to his involvement in a criminal case.
